title: Fizz
body: why you nerf fizz fizz is not good now peoples will stop play fizz now just why?

replies.body:
fizz is a braindead champion that can land R while being 0/10 and get free triple kill ace and win the game.

that is why fizz nerf, duh.

fizz has been nothing but nerf for years, and is still braindead overpowered because of specific issues.

the main issue is his ult has a 6 teemo hitbox, but visually only represents 1 teemo. his ult has been nerfed repeatedly, but if all they did was make it clear how big it was, rather than giving fizz an invisible fucking skillshot, his damage nerfs wouldn't be as necessary due to quality of life and clarity.

but riot just nerfs it in every imaginable way rather than fixing it's visual animation.

if the animation is just something they cannot fix, reduce the projectile speed and then fizz will be fine again.
coming from a katarina main? hehe

Not to mention kat isn't  slippy to catch like Fizz.
Hahahahahahah you are actually retard kat has flash every 7 sec but when you suck ofc she ia bad
I shitted on you in like 3 games with fizz lmao I love seeing your name!
I wouldn't say he's braindead, but he can get out of control pretty easily..
Fizz is a cancer champ that should be deleted tbh
But fizz is tier 1 on op.gg, and A tier on rankedboost?
He was last patch, now hes at less than 46% win rate so far lul
Y'all just don't know how to play against him so we take advantage of that.
Its time us fizz mains just go ahead and vault him..
